description:
Part A: Tests are an unavoidable part of a student`s life. 
Part B: Chio-chan spots a water pipe and starts talking about it as if it were her ideal boyfriend, which makes Manana laugh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chio change de look / Andô fait ce qu’il peut
Chio-chan Changes Her Image / Flat Cut
イメチェンちおちゃん / フラットカット
